.class->æœºå™¨ç  æ—¶ï¼Œ JVM ç±»åŠ è½½å™¨é¦–å…ˆåŠ è½½å­—èŠ‚ç æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œç„¶åé€šè¿‡è§£é‡Šå™¨é€è¡Œè§£é‡Šæ‰§è¡Œï¼Œè¿™ç§æ–¹å¼çš„æ‰§è¡Œé€Ÿåº¦ä¼šç›¸å¯¹æ¯”è¾ƒæ…¢ã€‚è€Œä¸”ï¼Œæœ‰äº›æ–¹æ³•å’Œä»£ç å—æ˜¯ç»å¸¸éœ€è¦è¢«è°ƒç”¨çš„(ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ‰€è°“çš„çƒ­ç‚¹ä»£ç )ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åé¢å¼•è¿›äº† JITï¼ˆjust-in-time compilationï¼‰ ç¼–è¯‘å™¨ï¼Œè€Œ JIT å±äºè¿è¡Œæ—¶ç¼–è¯‘ã€‚å½“ JIT ç¼–è¯‘å™¨å®Œæˆï¼Œä¸‹æ¬¡å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚è€Œæˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“ï¼Œæœºå™¨ç çš„è¿è¡Œæ•ˆç‡è‚¯å®šæ˜¯é«˜äº Java è§£é‡Šå™¨çš„ã€‚è¿™ä¹Ÿè§£é‡Šäº†æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆç»å¸¸ä¼šè¯´ Java æ˜¯ç¼–è¯‘ä¸è§£é‡Šå…±å­˜çš„è¯­è¨€ ã€‚

å¾ˆå¤šç¨‹åºè®¾è®¡è¯­è¨€ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚ C++ã€ Pascal )æä¾›äº†ä¸¤ç§å‚æ•°ä¼ é€’çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œä¸è¿‡ï¼Œåœ¨ Java ä¸­åªæœ‰å€¼ä¼ é€’ã€‚

å¯¹äºåˆšæ¥è§¦ Java çš„å­¦ä¹ è€…ï¼Œåº”è¯¥éƒ½ä¼šè§‰å¾—ï¼šJava å¯¹å¼•ç”¨ç±»å‹çš„å‚æ•°é‡‡ç”¨çš„æ˜¯å¼•ç”¨ä¼ é€’ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆçœ‹ä¸‹ä»¥ä¸‹æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼š

public class TransmitType {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Person zhangsan = new Person("å¼ ä¸‰");
        Person lisi = new Person("æå››");
        swap(zhangsan, lisi);
        System.out.println("xiaoZhang:" + zhangsan.getName());
        System.out.println("xiaoLi:" + lisi.getName());
    }

    public static void swap(Person person1, Person person2) {
        Person temp = person1;
        person1 = person2;
        person2 = temp;
        System.out.println("person1:" + person1.getName());
        System.out.println("person2:" + person2.getName());
    }
}
@Data
@AllArgsConstructor
class Person {
    private String name;
}

åºåˆ—åŒ–å· serialVersionUID å±äºç‰ˆæœ¬æ§åˆ¶çš„ä½œç”¨ã€‚ååºåˆ—åŒ–æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šæ£€æŸ¥ serialVersionUID æ˜¯å¦å’Œå½“å‰ç±»çš„ serialVersionUID ä¸€è‡´ã€‚å¦‚æœ serialVersionUID ä¸ä¸€è‡´åˆ™ä¼šæŠ›å‡º InvalidClassException å¼‚å¸¸ã€‚

å¯¹äºä¸æƒ³è¿›è¡Œåºåˆ—åŒ–çš„å˜é‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ transient å…³é”®å­—ä¿®é¥°ï¼Œé˜»æ­¢å®ä¾‹ä¸­é‚£äº›ç”¨æ­¤å…³é”®å­—ä¿®é¥°çš„çš„å˜é‡åºåˆ—åŒ–ã€‚åœ¨è¢«ååºåˆ—åŒ–åï¼Œtransient å˜é‡çš„å€¼è¢«è®¾ä¸ºåˆå§‹å€¼ï¼Œå¦‚ int å‹çš„æ˜¯ 0ï¼Œå¯¹è±¡å‹çš„æ˜¯ nullã€‚

Kryo

Kryo æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜æ€§èƒ½çš„åºåˆ—åŒ–/ååºåˆ—åŒ–å·¥å…·ï¼Œç”±äºå…¶å˜é•¿å­˜å‚¨ç‰¹æ€§å¹¶ä½¿ç”¨äº†å­—èŠ‚ç ç”Ÿæˆæœºåˆ¶ï¼Œæ‹¥æœ‰è¾ƒé«˜çš„è¿è¡Œé€Ÿåº¦å’Œè¾ƒå°çš„å­—èŠ‚ç ä½“ç§¯ã€‚

å¦å¤–ï¼ŒKryo å·²ç»æ˜¯ä¸€ç§éå¸¸æˆç†Ÿçš„åºåˆ—åŒ–å®ç°äº†ï¼Œå·²ç»åœ¨ Twitterã€Grouponã€Yahoo ä»¥åŠå¤šä¸ªè‘—åå¼€æºé¡¹ç›®ï¼ˆå¦‚ Hiveã€Stormï¼‰ä¸­å¹¿æ³›çš„ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

public class KryoSerializer implements Serializer {

    /**
     * Because Kryo is not thread safe. So, use ThreadLocal to store Kryo objects
     */
    private final ThreadLocal<Kryo> kryoThreadLocal = ThreadLocal.withInitial(() -> {
        Kryo kryo = new Kryo();
        kryo.register(RpcResponse.class);
        kryo.register(RpcRequest.class);
        return kryo;
    });

    @Override
    public byte[] serialize(Object obj) {
        try (ByteArrayOutputStream byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             Output output = new Output(byteArrayOutputStream)) {
            Kryo kryo = kryoThreadLocal.get();
            // Object->byte:å°†å¯¹è±¡åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ºbyteæ•°ç»„
            kryo.writeObject(output, obj);
            kryoThreadLocal.remove();
            return output.toBytes();
        } catch (Exception e) {
            throw new SerializeException("Serialization failed");
        }
    }

    @Override
    public <T> T deserialize(byte[] bytes, Class<T> clazz) {
        try (ByteArrayInputStream byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(bytes);
             Input input = new Input(byteArrayInputStream)) {
            Kryo kryo = kryoThreadLocal.get();
            // byte->Object:ä»byteæ•°ç»„ä¸­ååºåˆ—åŒ–å‡ºå¯¹è±¡
            Object o = kryo.readObject(input, clazz);
            kryoThreadLocal.remove();
            return clazz.cast(o);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            throw new SerializeException("Deserialization failed");
        }
    }

}

Json

Jsonæ˜¯ä¸€ç§é€šç”¨å’Œè½»é‡çº§çš„æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢æ ¼å¼ï¼Œæ˜¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œå­˜å‚¨ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç®€å•çš„æ¶ˆæ¯æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå…¨ç§°ä¸ºJavaScript Object Notationã€‚Jsonä½œä¸ºæ•°æ®åŒ…æ ¼å¼ä¼ è¾“æ—¶å…·æœ‰æ›´é«˜çš„æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯å› ä¸ºJsonä¸åƒxmlé‚£æ ·éœ€è¦æœ‰ä¸¥æ ¼çš„é—­åˆæ ‡ç­¾ï¼Œè¿™å°±è®©æœ‰æ•ˆæ•°æ®é‡ä¸æ€»æ•°æ®åŒ…æ¯”æœ‰ç€æ˜¾è‘—çš„æå‡ï¼Œä»è€Œå‡å°‘åŒç­‰æ•°æ®æµé‡çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ç½‘ç»œçš„ä¼ è¾“å‹åŠ›ï¼

Protobuf

Protobufæ˜¯Googleå¼€å‘çš„ä¸€ç§ç‹¬ç«‹å’Œè½»é‡çº§çš„æ•°æ®äº¤æ¢æ ¼å¼ï¼Œä»¥è¿›è¡Œå­˜å‚¨ï¼Œç”¨äºä¸åŒæœåŠ¡ä¹‹é—´åºåˆ—åŒ–æ•°æ®ã€‚å…¨ç§°ä¸ºProtocol Buffersï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç§è½»ä¾¿é«˜æ•ˆçš„ç»“æ„åŒ–æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨æ ¼å¼ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨äºç»“æ„åŒ–æ•°æ®ä¸²è¡ŒåŒ–ï¼Œæˆ–è€…åºåˆ—åŒ–ï¼Œå¯ç”¨äºé€šè®¯åè®®ã€æ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨ç­‰é¢†åŸŸçš„è¯­è¨€æ— å…³ã€å¹³å°æ— å…³ã€å¯æ‰©å±•çš„åºåˆ—åŒ–ç»“æ„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼ã€‚

äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®æµä¼˜ç‚¹

  • äºŒè¿›åˆ¶ç»“æ„å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œæ•ˆç‡é«˜ï¼Œåºåˆ—åŒ–ä½“ç§¯æ¯”Jsonå’Œxmlæ›´å°ã€æ›´åŠ çµæ´»ï¼›
  • æ ¼å¼è§„èŒƒï¼Œæ”¯æŒRPCï¼›
  • æ˜“äºä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¼€å‘äººå‘˜å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ç…§ä¸€å®šçš„è¯­æ³•å®šä¹‰ç»“æ„åŒ–çš„æ¶ˆæ¯æ ¼å¼ï¼Œç„¶åé€ç»™å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå·¥å…·ï¼Œå·¥å…·å°†è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆç›¸å…³çš„ç±»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ”¯æŒJAVAã€C++ã€Goç­‰è¯­è¨€ç¯å¢ƒã€‚é€šè¿‡è¿™ç±»ç±»åŒ…å«åœ¨é¡¹ç›®å½“ä¸­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¾ˆè½»æ¾çš„è°ƒç”¨ç›¸å…³æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®Œæˆä¸šåŠ¡æ¶ˆæ¯çš„åºåˆ—åŒ–ä¸ååºåˆ—å·¥ä½œï¼›

ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šå¯è¯»æ€§ä¸é«˜ï¼›

è¯­æ³•ç³–

æšä¸¾

public enum t {
    SPRING,SUMMER;
}

åç¼–è¯‘åï¼š

public final class T extends Enum
{
    private T(String s, int i)
    {
        super(s, i);
    }
    public static T[] values()
    {
        T at[];
        int i;
        T at1[];
        System.arraycopy(at = ENUM$VALUES, 0, at1 = new T[i = at.length], 0, i);
        return at1;
    }

    public static T valueOf(String s)
    {
        return (T)Enum.valueOf(demo/T, s);
    }

    public static final T SPRING;
    public static final T SUMMER;
    private static final T ENUM$VALUES[];
    static
    {
        SPRING = new T("SPRING", 0);
        SUMMER = new T("SUMMER", 1);
        ENUM$VALUES = (new T[] {
            SPRING, SUMMER
        });
    }
}

for-each

public static void main(String... args) {
    String[] strs = {"xy", "zzs", "hello"};
    for (String s : strs) {
        System.out.println(s);
    }
    List<String> strList = Arrays.asList("xy","zzs","hello");
    for (String s : strList) {
        System.out.println(s);
    }
}

åç¼–è¯‘åï¼š

public static transient void main(String args[])
{
    String strs[] = {
        "xy", "zzs", "hello"
    };
    String args1[] = strs;
    int i = args1.length;
    for(int j = 0; j < i; j++)
    {
        String s = args1[j];
        System.out.println(s);
    }

    List strList = Arrays.asList("xy", "zzs", "hello");
    String s;
    for(Iterator iterator = strList.iterator(); iterator.hasNext(); System.out.println(s))
        s = (String)iterator.next();

}

âš ï¸æŠ›å‡ºConcurrentModificationExceptionå¼‚å¸¸ã€‚

for (Student stu : students) {
    if (stu.getId() == 2)
        students.remove(stu);
}

å…³é”®ç‚¹å°±åœ¨äºï¼šè°ƒç”¨list.remove()æ–¹æ³•å¯¼è‡´modCountå’ŒexpectedModCountçš„å€¼ä¸ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œåç»­è°ƒç”¨iterator.hasNext()ä¼šè¿›è¡Œæ£€æŸ¥

public class ArrayList<E> {
    public boolean remove(Object o) {
        if (o == null) {
            for (int index = 0; index < size; index++)
                if (elementData[index] == null) {
                    fastRemove(index);
                    return true;
                }
        } else {
            for (int index = 0; index < size; index++)
                if (o.equals(elementData[index])) {
                    fastRemove(index);
                    return true;
                }
        }
        return false;
    }
    private void fastRemove(int index) {
        modCount++;
        int numMoved = size - index - 1;
        if (numMoved > 0)
            System.arraycopy(elementData, index+1, elementData, index,
                             numMoved);
        elementData[--size] = null; // clear to let GC do its work
    }
}

private class Itr implements Iterator<E> {
    int cursor;       // index of next element to return
    int lastRet = -1; // index of last element returned; -1 if no such
    int expectedModCount = modCount;
    
    public boolean hasNext() {
        return cursor != size;
    }

    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
    public E next() {
        checkForComodification();//è¿™é‡Œä¼šæ£€æŸ¥
        int i = cursor;
        if (i >= size)
            throw new NoSuchElementException();
        Object[] elementData = ArrayList.this.elementData;
        if (i >= elementData.length)
            throw new ConcurrentModificationException();
        cursor = i + 1;
        return (E) elementData[lastRet = i];
    }

    public void remove() {
        if (lastRet < 0)
            throw new IllegalStateException();
        checkForComodification();

        try {
            ArrayList.this.remove(lastRet);
            cursor = lastRet;
            lastRet = -1;
            expectedModCount = modCount;//æ›´æ–°expectedModCountï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è°ƒç”¨è¿™ä¸ªremove()å¯é¿å…
        } catch (IndexOutOfBoundsException ex) {
            throw new ConcurrentModificationException();
        }
    }

    final void checkForComodification() {
        if (modCount != expectedModCount)
            throw new ConcurrentModificationException();
    }
}

å•çº¿ç¨‹çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š

  • ä½¿ç”¨ Itr ç±»ä¸­ä¹Ÿç»™å‡ºçš„ remove() æ–¹æ³•ï¼šå› ä¸º Iterator çš„ remove ä¼šæ›´æ–° expectedModCount çš„å€¼ã€‚

å¤šçº¿ç¨‹çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š

  • åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨iteratorè¿­ä»£çš„æ—¶å€™ä½¿ç”¨synchronizedæˆ–è€…Lockè¿›è¡ŒåŒæ­¥ï¼›
  • ä½¿ç”¨å¹¶å‘å®¹å™¨CopyOnWriteArrayListä»£æ›¿ArrayListå’ŒVectorã€‚

try-with-resource

Java é‡Œï¼Œå¯¹äºæ–‡ä»¶æ“ä½œ IO æµã€æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ç­‰å¼€é”€éå¸¸æ˜‚è´µçš„èµ„æºï¼Œç”¨å®Œä¹‹åå¿…é¡»åŠæ—¶é€šè¿‡ close æ–¹æ³•å°†å…¶å…³é—­ï¼Œå¦åˆ™èµ„æºä¼šä¸€ç›´å¤„äºæ‰“å¼€çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå¯èƒ½ä¼šå¯¼è‡´å†…å­˜æ³„éœ²ç­‰é—®é¢˜ã€‚å…³é—­èµ„æºçš„å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹å¼å°±æ˜¯åœ¨finallyå—é‡Œæ˜¯é‡Šæ”¾ï¼Œå³è°ƒç”¨closeæ–¹æ³•ã€‚

public static void main(String... args) {
    try (BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("d:\\ xy.xml"))) {
        String line;
        while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
            System.out.println(line);
        }
    } catch (IOException e) {
        // handle exception
    }
}

é‡å†™equalsæ–¹æ³• å’Œ hashcode æ–¹æ³•

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å»å®ç°ä»¥ä¸Šé€»è¾‘ï¼Œå…ˆé‡å†™equalsæ–¹æ³•ï¼šåªè¦èƒ½ä¿è¯æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œå°±è¿”å›ç›¸ç­‰trueã€‚ä»£ç å°±ä¸è´´äº†ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨å„å±æ€§å€¼ç›¸ç­‰è¿”å›å³å¯ã€‚
